name: The BOSS: A Jacksepticeye Fan Game
name_original: The BOSS: A Jacksepticeye Fan Game
description:
Created by the community, for the community! 

Follow the game's development team: http://sarcastic-pasta-games.tumblr.com/

•Be sure to go through the read.me file! Trust me, you don't want to ignore that.
•Let's Plays are 100% welcomed. We'll watch them all! Link them in a comment.

Features: 
• All new original soundtrack
• Cameos galore
• Much, much more… but we don’t want to give you too many spoilers!

It happened in an instant. Millions of people all over the world have fallen unconscious. Scientists are baffled. No one can seem to find a correlation between everyone who vanished. But things are even more mysterious for our good friend Jack. When he goes online to check on his community, he finds thousands of messages containing nothing but two words: SAVE US. He receives a strange email, which immediately knocks him out upon clicking on it. Once awake, he discovers that he's somehow ended up inside his own computer.  Now Jack must battle through his own games to save his subscribers from someone calling themself the BOSS...

This game is STORY DRIVEN. There are puzzles and such but it does take its time to tell a full story and we did our best to make it immersive with interesting characters and dialogue. That being said, if you're looking for a fast paced adventure or a difficult puzzle game with complex mechanics, this game isn't for you. However, if you like games with lots of lovable characters and an immersive story, you'll love this game.

Please be advised that this may be a slightly outdated copy of the game. The game's most updated version can be found on GameJolt. Unfortunately, this site would not allow us to upload the new version, as it was too large.
